title: Automated deployment with AWS Elastic Beanstalk (EB) – Part II
Forward secrecy for offline messages in Bleep
description: Our initial implementation of asynchronous offline messaging in Bleep[1] used an encryption scheme which provided authentication and confidentiality, but not forward secrecy[2].
